text: On Our Merry Way is a 1948 American comedy movie directed by Leslie Fenton, George Stevens, John Huston, King Vidor. It stars Paulette Goddard, Burgess Meredith, James Stewart, Henry Fonda, Harry James, Dorothy Lamour, Victor Moore, Dorothy Ford, Fred MacMurray, Hugh Herbert and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * On Our Merry Way at the Internet Movie Database Category:1948 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Leslie Fenton Category:Movies directed by George Stevens Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Movies directed by King Vidor
title: On Our Merry Way
